title: CORNER UNIT / CITY & RIVER VIEWS / WALKIN CLOSET / GYM / CONCIERGE / R
posting_body: ['CORNER UNIT / CITY & RIVER VIEWS / WALKIN CLOSET / GYM / CONCIERGE / ROOF DECK / WASHER & DRYER', 'Listing ID #: 212857', 'Price: $8,935', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 2.0', 'Approx.', 'Size: 1,125 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Building Amenities', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Garage', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Lounge', 'Pool', 'Receiving Room', 'Roof Deck', 'Subway', 'Valet', 'Serenity in the clouds.', 'With astonishing views from every room!', 'An unparalleled living experience awaits you in this highly coveted building.', 'This sophisticated apartment offers you maximum convenience, whilst being bathed in luxurious finishes all around.', 'Soaring above the Manhattan landscape, you will wake up and instantly have your senses energized.', 'When you come home you will be greeted by opulence and comfort at every turn.', 'Soaring 42 stories above the Hudson River, the building offers luxurious waterfront living with stunning vistas.', 'Residences perched above a dramatic double-height vaulted marble lobby are specially designed to offer breathtaking views of the Hudson and Manhattan skyline.', "Tribeca is a phenomenal neighborhood featuring upscale restaurants and boutiques that make up it's chic commercial center, while quiet cobblestone streets and impressive loft buildings lend the area an air of tranquility.", 'For showings contact: Adel Talebpour / Bouklis Group / 212-961-7334 (Cell) / <URL> / <URL> / <URL>', 'Adel Talebpour', 'Phone: 212-402-7855', 'Mobile: 212-961-7334', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 212-402-7855 \xa0 212-961-7334 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Adel Talebpour at 212-961-7334']
